name: Magic Survivor
description:
Simple game inspired by "Vampire Survivors", except with way less weapons and only one stage, oh and no level up weapon upgrades. The game was created for a University Thesis with subject of using Unity DOTS.

List of assets used:
Battle Wizard Poly Art by Dungeon Mason
Free Stylized Skybox by Yuki2022
FX Magic Circle Free by FX_Kandol_Pack
Hats pack - 3D Microgames Add-Ons by Unity Technologies
Lowpoly Textures Pack by N-hance Studio
LowPoly Trees and Rocks by greyRoad Studio
RPG Monster Duo PBR Polyart by Dungeon Mason
Simple Fantasy Traveling Music Pack by Alan Zaring
Simple Icons by Little Sweet Daemon
